item.title: CSS Gameboy
item.description: Draw a Gameboy with HTML & CSS Hello again, my name is Jorge and I’ve drawn the Original Gameboy with html,css and some javascript lines. Check the full demo here: gameboy. Repository url: https://github.com/baumannzone/gameboy-css
